blogPost.excerpt: Drata saves companies hundreds of hours per year getting and staying SOC 2 compliant by continuously monitoring their security posture and automatically collecting evidence of their controls across AWS, GCP, GitHub, Jira, Gusto, G Suite, Office365 and more.
blogPost.body: Drata saves companies hundreds of hours per year getting and staying SOC 2 compliant by continuously monitoring their security posture and automatically collecting evidence of their controls across AWS, GCP, GitHub, Jira, Gusto, G Suite, Office365 and more.
blogPost.title: Drata - Put SOC 2 Compliance on Autopilot
blogPost.author: Hiten Shah

localize.description: Drata通过持续监控其安全态势并自动收集AWS、GCP、GitHub、Jira、Gusto、G Suite、Office365等的控制证据，每年可为公司节省数百小时的时间，以获得并保持SOC 2合规性。
localize.tagline: 将SOC 2合规性置于自动驾驶状态

localize.description: Drata通過持續監控其安全態勢並自動收集AWS、GCP、GitHub、Jira、Gusto、G Suite、Office365等的控制證據，每年可爲公司節省數百小時的時間，以獲得並保持SOC 2合規性。
localize.tagline: 將SOC 2合規性置於自動駕駛狀態

previous.excerpt: The real metal finish on the main camera adds unity to the design and accentuates the luxury of the haze texture. It’s an iconic new camera design made to turn heads.
previous.title: Samsung Galaxy S21 5G - Samsungs newest range of 5G smartphones

localize.description: 主摄像头上的真金属处理增加了设计的统一性，并突出了雾霾质感的豪华感。这是一款标志性的新相机设计，让人眼前一亮。
localize.tagline: 三星最新的5G智能手机系列。

localize.description: 主攝像頭上的真金屬處理增加了設計的統一性，並突出了霧霾質感的豪華感。這是一款標誌性的新相機設計，讓人眼前一亮。
localize.tagline: 三星最新的5G智能手機系列。

next.excerpt: Block Party builds tools against online abuse. Our mission is to create a safer online experience by building solutions for user control, protection and safety. Use Block Party to filter out unwanted @mentions from Twitter and take control of your online experience.
next.title: Block Party - Bye-bye, Twitter trolls 👋

localize.description: Block Party打造的工具可以防止网络滥用。我们的使命是通过构建用户控制、保护和安全的解决方案来创造更安全的在线体验。使用Block Party过滤掉Twitter上不需要的@mentions，并控制您的在线体验。
Block Party打造的工具可以防止網絡濫用。我們的使命是通過構建用戶控制、保護和安全的解決方案來創造更安全的在線體驗。使用Block Party過濾掉Twitter上不需要的@mentions，並控制您的在線體驗。
